'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Points of interest==
* This is a small hut in Sātahuzi, and residence of the local chief.

==Characters==
* [[Storm Speaker Ikawha]], during nighttime.
title: Chieftain's Lodge (Sātahuzi)
